caption.p: Neuroprotective and memory enhancing effect on D. morbifera. MAPK: mitogen-activated protein kinase; NFκB: Nuclear factor kappa B; NO: Nitric oxide; iNOS: Inducible nitric oxide synthase; COX-2: Cyclooxygenase-2; IL-1β: Interleukin 1 beta; IL-6: Interleukin 6; TNF-α: Tumor necrosis factor-alpha; cAMP: Cyclic adenosine monophosphate; CREB: cAMP response element-binding; BDNF: Brain-derived neurotrophic factor.
